TextView.android:text: -It is a conversational agent which interacts with user in natural language. -It is designed to mimic human interaction to create certain level of comfort level. -“Chatbot” is a natural language processing based application that will be answering all the college related queries put forth by the users. -Natural language processing is a science that refers to the use of computers to process and analyze natural language for any number of purposes. -NLP involves natural language understanding that is, enabling computers to derive meaning from human or natural language input, and produce the desired output.Taking into consideration for the presence of synonyms/keywords it will parse the user query and produce an appropriate answer for it.

-Provide appropriate reply to student’s query. -Provide up-to-date information to the students. -Take necessary information from the students. -Extract authentic reviews from feedback data using web mining. -The system should have knowledge base which is acquired from web pages and constructed automatically without manual efforts. -The constructed knowledge-base can be queried with domain related queries and the system provides the most relevant details for the query.

-Api.ai is a voice-enabling engine that allows the addition of voice interfaces to apps based on Android, iOS, HTML5, and Cordova to third party developers. -The SDK's contain features like voice recognition, natural language understanding, and text-to-speech. It also offers a web interface to build and test conversation scenarios. -The platform is based on a natural language processing engine which allows Internet of Things(IoT) developers to include natural language voice interfaces in their products.

-The proposed system generates assuring results and it reduces a great deal of human effort in the extraction of knowledge and providing the students correct information -Extracting authentic reviews from feedback data using web mining -Alternative to confusing user interface and websites by developing a language based question and answer simulation module -Hub for multiple applications with different purposes, to provide user with a centralized one stop solution.
